code: import axios from"axios";export const fetchData=async urlLink=>{const options={method:"GET",url:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_URL_TMDB).concat(urlLink),headers:{accept:"application/json",Authorization:process.env.REACT_APP_AUTH}};try{const response=await axios.request(options);console.log(response.data.results);return response.data.results;}catch(error){throw new Error("Something is wrong!!!!");}};export const fetchDetails=async urlLink=>{const detail={method:"GET",url:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_URL_TMDB).concat(urlLink),headers:{accept:"application/json",Authorization:process.env.REACT_APP_AUTH}};try{const response=await axios.request(detail);console.log(response.data);return response.data;}catch(error){throw new Error("Something is wrong!!!!");}};
